shortdesc.ph: Configurations of injecting an external audio or video stream.

p.codeblock: export class InjectStreamConfig { width?: number height?: number videoGop?: number videoFramerate?: number videoBitrate?: number audioSampleRate?: AudioSampleRateType audioBitrate?: number audioChannels?: number }

plentry.props: android cpp unity flutter electron rn
plentry.pd: The width of the external video stream after injecting. The default value is 0, which represents the same width as the original.

plentry.props: android cpp unity flutter electron rn
plentry.pd: The height of the external video stream after injecting. The default value is 0, which represents the same height as the original.
The size of the external video stream after injecting.
The GOP (in frames) of injecting the external video stream. The default value is 30.
The frame rate (fps) of injecting the external video stream. The default rate is 15 fps.

pd.p: The bitrate (Kbps) of injecting the external video stream. The default value is 400 Kbps.
pd.note: The bitrate setting is closely linked to the video resolution. If the bitrate you set is beyond a reasonable range, the SDK sets it within a reasonable range.

pd.p: The sampling rate (Hz) of injecting the external audio stream. The default value is 48000 Hz. See .
pd.note: Agora recommends using the default value.

pd.p: The bitrate (Kbps) of injecting the external audio stream. The default value is 48 Kbps.
pd.note: Agora recommends using the default value.

pd.p:
外部音频流输入后的频道数。
1: (Default) Mono.
2: Stereo.
pd.note: Agora recommends using the default value.
